Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig

Class WlsDomainConfig

java.lang.Object
oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig.WlsDomainConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
WlsDomain
public class WlsDomainConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements WlsDomain
Contains a snapshot of configuration for a WebLogic Domain.

      public WlsDomainConfig​(java.lang.String name)

    • WlsDomainConfig

      public WlsDomainConfig​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String adminServerName, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​WlsClusterConfig> wlsClusterConfigs, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​WlsServerConfig> wlsServerConfigs, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​WlsServerConfig> wlsServerTemplates, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​WlsMachineConfig> wlsMachineConfigs)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of this WLS domain
      adminServerName - Name of the admin server in this WLS domain
      wlsClusterConfigs - A Map containing clusters configured in this WLS domain
      wlsServerConfigs - A Map containing servers configured in the WLS domain
      wlsServerTemplates - A Map containing server templates configued in this WLS domain
      wlsMachineConfigs - A Map containing machines configured in the WLS domain

    • getClusterConfigs

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​WlsClusterConfig> getClusterConfigs()
      Returns all cluster configurations found in the WLS domain.
      Returns:
      A Map of WlsClusterConfig, keyed by name, containing server configurations for all clusters found in the WLS domain

    • getConfiguredClusters

      public java.util.List<WlsClusterConfig> getConfiguredClusters()

    • setConfiguredClusters

      public void setConfiguredClusters​(java.util.List<WlsClusterConfig> configuredClusters)

    • getServerConfigs

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​WlsServerConfig> getServerConfigs()
      Returns configuration of servers found in the WLS domain, including admin server, standalone managed servers that do not belong to any cluster, and statically configured managed servers that belong to a cluster. It does not include dynamic servers configured in dynamic clusters.
      Returns:
      A Map of WlsServerConfig, keyed by name, for each server configured the WLS domain

    • getServers

      public java.util.List<WlsServerConfig> getServers()

    • setServers

      public void setServers​(java.util.List<WlsServerConfig> servers)

    • getMachineConfigs

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​WlsMachineConfig> getMachineConfigs()
      Returns configuration of machines found in the WLS domain.
      Returns:
      A Map of WlsMachineConfig, keyed by name, for each machine configured the WLS domain

    • getClusterConfig

      public WlsClusterConfig getClusterConfig​(java.lang.String clusterName)
      Returns the configuration for the WLS cluster with the given name.
      Parameters:
      clusterName - name of the WLS cluster
      Returns:
      The WlsClusterConfig object containing configuration of the WLS cluster with the given name. This methods return an empty WlsClusterConfig object even if no WLS configuration is found for the given cluster name.

    • getServerConfig

      public WlsServerConfig getServerConfig​(java.lang.String serverName)
      Returns the configuration for the WLS server with the given name. Note that this method would not return dynamic server.
      Parameters:
      serverName - name of the WLS server
      Returns:
      The WlsServerConfig object containing configuration of the WLS server with the given name. This methods return null if no WLS configuration is found for the given server name.

    • containsCluster

      public boolean containsCluster​(java.lang.String clusterName)
      Whether the WebLogic domain contains a cluster with the given cluster name.
      Parameters:
      clusterName - cluster name to be checked
      Returns:
      True if the WebLogic domain contains a cluster with the given cluster name

    • containsServer

      public boolean containsServer​(java.lang.String serverName)
      Whether the WebLogic domain contains a server with the given server name, not including servers that are part of a dynamic cluster.
      Parameters:
      serverName - server name to be checked
      Returns:
      True if the WebLogic domain contains a server with the given server name

    • getMachineConfig

      public WlsMachineConfig getMachineConfig​(java.lang.String machineName)
      Returns the configuration for the WLS machine with the given name.
      Parameters:
      machineName - name of the WLS machine
      Returns:
      The WlsMachineConfig object containing configuration of the WLS machine with the given name. This methods return null if no WLS machine is configured with the given name.

    • getReplicaLimit

      public int getReplicaLimit​(java.lang.String clusterName)
      Description copied from interface: WlsDomain
      Returns the maximum number of replicas in the specified cluster. A domain configuration may not request more replicas than this.
      Specified by:
      getReplicaLimit in interface WlsDomain
      Parameters:
      clusterName - the name of the cluster
      Returns:
      a non-negative integer value
